price: 33.Kaadu Nabii Muusa isi gaba isi kamiisik moyya как culta ikkek culussu heeh edde luk hadiffi heeh, too waqdi is (gaba kinnuk) yable marat qidih ifak raqqa itte baras aalle kalah.
arabic: وَنَزَعَ يَدَهُۥ فَإِذَا هِيَ بَيۡضَآءُ لِلنَّٰظِرِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wanazaʿa yadahu fa-idhā hiya bayḍāu lilnnāẓirīna
